en: Monster hurricane “Melissa” threatens Jamaica: Does climate change require a new category for cyclones? Hurricane Melissa reaches historic strength and threatens Jamaica with extreme rainfall and hurricane-force winds. Climate researchers are seeing a pattern: Category 4 and 5 storms are reaching record levels more and more frequently. What does this mean for the future of hurricanes?
